api.name: query
api.description: a search engine. useful for when you need to answer questions about current events. input should be a search query.

SEARCH_ENGINE_TYPE.title: 选择搜索引擎
SEARCH_ENGINE_TYPE.description: 选择你想要使用的搜索引擎,请输入'google', 'baidu', 'duckduckgo'

SECRET_KEY.title: SECRET_KEY
SECRET_KEY.description: 请填写你部署时设置的SECRET_KEY
